item.title: Learn to Type Faster with Ratatype Typing Tutor
item.author: mirodil@websnippet.io (Mirodil)
item.description: RatatypeÂ is an online typing tutor and a great website for people who want to type better. Start mastering your skills with us, challenge your friends or simply get a typing certificate. Typing is a more important skill than writing nowadays. And if you do it slow you are just wasting your time. Your time deserves much more than this. If you increase your typing speed by 30% you can save 20 minutes daily.
